`I need money'

It is me said that you grasp for men things

(Grettis saga, p. 1039)

tier.item: (11) ... og er Egilli sá skipið, þá kenndi hann ___i
þegar
... and when Egill saw the ship, then knew he at
once
`And when Egill saw the ship, he knew it immediately'
(Egils saga, p. 452)
